page.title: 15Wootton Boys F.C.
page.content: Wootton have a boys football club.There are 15 members in the club.As well as boys from Wootton,there are boys from Freeland,Begbroke,Long Hanborough, Woodstock and Glympton.All the boys are aged between 9 and 11 years old. The manager is Mr. Roger Davis.The team has had quite a successful season.We play in a league which has 5 other teams.We play each team twice at home and twice away. We have recently played two six-a-side competitions.In the first one we got to the semi-finals,and in the last one we won it.We won a big cup and each member of the team won a small trophy.
